p: The anticoagulant activity of P3a and SP3a (5 and 10 mg/mL dissolved in saline) was evaluated by using a semi-automatic hemagglutinator (Transasia Bio-medicals, Mumbai, India Ltd.). According to the reported protocol, in vitro coagulation determination of activated partial thromboplastin time (APTT), prothrombin time (PT) and thrombin time (TT) was determined using specific reagents and standard human plasma ( Liu etÂ al., 2018).
